DataListSpec.Name: Application Users By System Role Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing application users by system role records.
DataListSpec.Author: Abel C. Debela

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_APPLICATIONUSERSBYSYSTEMROLE as select TOP 6 SR.ID , SR.NAME as SYSTEMROLENAME , COUNT(1) NUMBEROFUSERS from dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER SRAU inner join dbo.SYSTEMROLE SR ON SRAU.SYSTEMROLEID = SR.ID GROUP BY SR.ID, SR.NAME ORDER BY COUNT(1) DESC
